e-start.message: You are trapped in the prison, two guards laughing at you, you found some tools to escape while those two didn't know, what tools you are going to use?

choices.name: NrG Drink
choices.message: NrG - Side Effects include: Nausea, Headaches, Rapid Heartrate and possibilities of Stroke and/or Heart Attack. Hmm... Well that's good to know

choices.name: Teleporter
choices.message: You just can't seem to get the hang of that thing can you?

e-file1.message: You have a file now, where you are going to use it?

e-file2.message: You break the cell bars, two guards saw you and you hide to the door, what you're going to do?

choices.name: Belt of Grenades
choices.message: *Grenade bounces onto you* Uhh... I don't even know what to say about that one...

e-file3.message: You climbed onto the vent using the chair, there's only two ways, which way you want to go?

choices.name: Left
choices.message: *Fell off the briefing room with many guards* Fatty

e-file4.message: You successfully find a way out, unfortunately you are in the roof, but you seems to have tools to used, what tools you're going to use?

choices.name: Rope
choices.message: *fell off to the rope* This seems awfully familiar...

choices.name: Parachute
choices.message: I think that was just a regular backpack. See what happens when you assume?

choices.name: JetPack
choices.message: It takes many hours of Jetpack training before you're able to operate one
